Articles.Content:
This has taken me about an hour, after improvement after impovment. the first version was very unstable and when doing a pitch p of too much g\'s it would explode. it would also flap its wings. eventually i fixed that with struts, but then the landing gear would bend a bit so i fixed that. also, the reason for the big gear in the back is so that it dosent destroy the engines.

Pics:

http://i.picasion.com/pic55/a1a7d1fae8a9faaa2ca999f42c84811c.gif

NOTE: the first picture is how it started out and the last one is the current.

Hope ya like it!

EDIT: it needs this mod: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13225.msg203839#msg203839
